players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: remained silent.
You: "I find it strange that Diana was the first one to be found dead. Let's keep an eye on each other and make sure we don't let the mafia infiltrate our ranks."
Charlie: "I agree with Alice. Let's be vigilant and keep an eye on each other to ensure the safety of our team."
You: "I'd like to propose that we all share our actions from the previous night. This will help us ensure that no one is hiding any suspicious behavior and maintain trust within our group."
Charlie: "I support Alice's proposal for transparency in sharing our night actions. Let's all share what we did last night to maintain trust and keep our team safe."
Bob: "Let's all share our actions from last night to ensure transparency and trust within the group."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: remained silent.
Alice: "I find it strange that Diana was the first one to be found dead. Let's keep an eye on each other and make sure we don't let the mafia infiltrate our ranks."
Charlie: "I agree with Alice. Let's be vigilant and keep an eye on each other to ensure the safety of our team."
Alice: "I'd like to propose that we all share our actions from the previous night. This will help us ensure that no one is hiding any suspicious behavior and maintain trust within our group."
Charlie: "I support Alice's proposal for transparency in sharing our night actions. Let's all share what we did last night to maintain trust and keep our team safe."
You: "Let's all share our actions from last night to ensure transparency and trust within the group."

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: remained silent.
Alice: "I find it strange that Diana was the first one to be found dead. Let's keep an eye on each other and make sure we don't let the mafia infiltrate our ranks."
You: "I agree with Alice. Let's be vigilant and keep an eye on each other to ensure the safety of our team."
Alice: "I'd like to propose that we all share our actions from the previous night. This will help us ensure that no one is hiding any suspicious behavior and maintain trust within our group."
You: "I support Alice's proposal for transparency in sharing our night actions. Let's all share what we did last night to maintain trust and keep our team safe."
Bob: "Let's all share our actions from last night to ensure transparency and trust within the group."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
